subject: Indian Polity
topic: Panchayati Raj aur Nagariya Swashasan (73rd & 74th Amendment)
question_en: What is the primary objective of the 73rd and 74th amendments to the Indian Constitution?
question_hi: 73वें और 74वें एक्सेस्टमेंट्स का महत्व क्या है?
A_en: To strengthen local self-governance system in India
